caption:
Patients with eczema have been found to have a different gut microbiota composition relative to those without eczema, and recent research has found that the use of certain oral probiotics can help reduce the extent and severity of eczema and improve quality of life.
 
Our BIA Synbiotic combines prebiotics and probiotic strains known to deliver antioxidant and anti-inflammatory effects. Its goal is to complement the effectiveness of your topical treatments by addressing the connections between the gut microbiome, inflammation, and skin health.
 
#codexlabs #eczema #eczemarelief #eczemasupplement #gutskinaxis #integrativedermatology
